title: CUDA is not available, Jump  cpu run training.
body:
python ./train.py -d 0 --identifier baseline config/wireframe.yaml

{   'io': {   'datadir': 'data/wireframe/',
              'logdir': 'logs/',
              'num_workers': 4,
              'resume_from': None,
              'tensorboard_port': 0,
              'validation_interval': 24000},
    'model': {   'backbone': 'stacked_hourglass',
                 'batch_size': 6,
                 'batch_size_eval': 2,
                 'depth': 4,
                 'dim_fc': 1024,
                 'dim_loi': 128,
                 'eval_junc_thres': 0.008,
                 'head_size': <BoxList: [[2], [1], [2]]>,
                 'image': {   'mean': <BoxList: [109.73, 103.832, 98.681]>,
                              'stddev': <BoxList: [22.275, 22.124, 23.229]>},
                 'loss_weight': {   'jmap': 8.0,
                                    'joff': 0.25,
                                    'lmap': 0.5,
                                    'lneg': 1,
                                    'lpos': 1},
                 'n_dyn_junc': 300,
                 'n_dyn_negl': 80,
                 'n_dyn_othr': 600,
                 'n_dyn_posl': 300,
                 'n_out_junc': 250,
                 'n_out_line': 2500,
                 'n_pts0': 32,
                 'n_pts1': 8,
                 'n_stc_negl': 40,
                 'n_stc_posl': 300,
                 'num_blocks': 1,
                 'num_stacks': 2,
                 'use_conv': 0,
                 'use_cood': 0,
                 'use_slop': 0},
    'optim': {   'amsgrad': True,
                 'lr': 0.0004,
                 'lr_decay_epoch': 10,
                 'max_epoch': 24,
                 'name': 'Adam',
                 'weight_decay': 0.0001}}
CUDA is not available
ntrain: 20000
nvalid: 462
